original_text: So Jacob called the name of the place where God had spoken with him Bethel.
korean_text: 하나님이 자기와 말씀하시던 곳의 이름을 벧엘이라 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: So Jacob called the name of the place
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 야곱은 그 장소의 이름을 불렀습니다

sentences.original_text: where God had spoken with him
